thread.title: BRIEF-BlackRock CEO Larry Fink, On Trade Wars, Says Chinese Willing To Have Conversation With The U.S. - CNBC

title: BRIEF-BlackRock CEO Larry Fink, On Trade Wars, Says Chinese Willing To Have Conversation With The U.S. - CNBC
text:
44 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-BlackRock CEO Larry Fink, On Trade Wars, Says Chinese Willing To Have Conversation With The U.S. - CNBC Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - 
* BLACKROCK CEO LARRY FINK SAYS VOLATILITY DID CHANGE THE WHOLE DIMENSION OF THE MARKET, SO WE DID SEE A SLOW DOWN IN BUSINESS IN FEBRUARY - CNBC 
* BLACKROCK CEO LARRY FINK, ON TRADE WARS, SAYS CHINESE WILLING TO HAVE CONVERSATION WITH THE U.S. - CNBC 
* BLACKROCK CEO LARRY FINK SAYS CO ALSO SAW SLOW DOWN IN BUSINESS IN MARCH DUE TO MARKET VOLATILITY - CNBC Further company coverage:
